member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ApiCall`2
member.summary: Bridge between an RPC method (with synchronous and asynchronous variants) and higher level abstractions, applying call settings as required.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ApiCall`2.Async(`0,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Performs an RPC call asynchronously.
member.param: The RPC request.
The call settings to apply to this specific call, overriding defaults where necessary.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result of the completed task will be the RPC response.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ApiCall`2.Sync(`0,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Performs an RPC call synchronously.
member.param: The RPC request.
The call settings to apply to this specific call, overriding defaults where necessary.
member.returns: The RPC response.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings
member.summary: Backoff settings used within to implement exponential backoff.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings.Delay
member.summary: The initial delay, either for the first retry or as the initial RPC timeout.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings.MaxDelay
member.summary: The maximum delay to use. If the increasing delay due to the delay multiplier exceeds this, this maximum is used instead.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings.DelayMultiplier
member.summary: The multiplier to apply to the delay on each iteration; must be greater than or equal to 1.0.

remarks.para: As an example, a multiplier of 2.0 with a delay of 0.1s on an RPC which fails three times before succeeding would lead to an initial delay between the first response and the second request of 0.1s; a delay between the second response and the third request of 0.2s, and a delay between the third response and the fourth request.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings.#ctor(System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified settings.
member.param: The initial delay, either for the first retry or as the initial RPC timeout.
The maximum delay to use. If the increasing delay due to the delay multiplier exceeds this, this maximum is used instead.
The multiplier to apply to the delay on each iteration; must be greater than or equal to 1.0. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings.NextDelay(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Works out the next delay from the current one, based on the multiplier and maximum.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings

that will be used for the call.
for propagating settings from a parent call.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings.Merge(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Merges the settings in with those in , with taking priority. If both arguments are null, the result is null. If one argument is null, the other argument is returned. Otherwise, a new object is created with a property-wise overlay. Any header mutations are combined, however: the mutation from the original is performed, then the mutation in the overlay.
member.param: Original settings. May be null.
Settings to overlay. May be null.
member.returns: A merged set of call settings.

member.summary: Creates a for the specified cancellation token.
member.param: The cancellation token for the new settings.
member.returns: A new instance.

member.returns: A new instance, or null if is null.

member.returns: A new instance or null if is null..

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for . All methods accept a null first parameter as valid unless stated otherwise.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettingsExtensions.MergedWith(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: This method merges the settings in with those in , with taking priority. If both arguments are null, the result is null. If one argument is null, the other argument is returned. Otherwise, a new object is created with a property-wise overlay, where null values do not override non-null values. Any header mutations are combined, however: the mutation from the original is performed, then the mutation in the overlay.
member.param: Original settings. May be null.
Settings to overlay. May be null.
member.returns: A merged set of call settings, or null if both parameters are null.

member.param: Original settings. May be null, in which case the returned settings will only contain the cancellation token.
Cancellation token for the new call settings.
member.returns: A new set of call settings.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettingsExtensions.WithCallCredentials(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings,Grpc.Core.CallCredentials)
member.summary: Returns a new with the specified call credentials, merged with the (optional) original settings specified by .
member.param: Original settings. May be null, in which case the returned settings will only contain call credentials.
Call credentials for the new call settings. This may be null, in which case any call credentials in are not present in the new call settings. If both this and are null, the return value is null.
member.returns: A new set of call settings, or null if both parameters are null.

member.param: Original settings. May be null, in which case the returned settings will only contain call timing.
Call timing for the new call settings. This may be null, in which case any call timing in are not present in the new call settings. If both this and are null, the return value is null.
member.returns: A new set of call settings, or null if both parameters are null.

member.param: Original settings. May be null, in which case the returned settings will only contain the header.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool
member.summary: A pool of channels for the same service, but with potentially different endpoints. Each endpoint has a single channel. All channels created by this pool use default application credentials. This class is thread-safe.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool._lazyScopedDefaultChannelCredentials
member.summary: Lazily-created task to retrieve the default application channel credentials. Once completed, this task can be used whenever channel credentials are required. The returned task always runs in the thread pool, so its result can be used synchronously from synchronous methods without risk of deadlock. The same channel credentials are used by all pools. The field is initialized in the constructor, as it uses _scopes, and you can't refer to an instance field within an instance field initializer.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a channel pool which will apply the specified scopes to the default application credentials if they require any.
member.param: The scopes to apply. Must not be null, and must not contain null references. May be empty.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool.ShutdownChannelsAsync
member.summary: Shuts down all the currently-allocated channels asynchronously. This does not prevent the channel pool from being used later on, but the currently-allocated channels will not be reused.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool.GetChannel(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceEndpoint)
member.summary: Returns a channel from this pool, creating a new one if there is no channel already associated with .
member.param: The endpoint to connect to. Must not be null.
member.returns: A channel for the specified endpoint.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ChannelPool.GetChannelAsync(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceEndpoint)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns a channel from this pool, creating a new one if there is no channel already associated with .
member.param: The endpoint to connect to. Must not be null.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The value of the completed task will be channel for the specified endpoint.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ClientHelper.Scheduler

The default method call settings.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings
member.summary: Settings for retrying RPCs.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.RetryBackoff
member.summary: The backoff policy for the time between retries.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.TimeoutBackoff
member.summary: The backoff policy for timeouts of retries.
member.remarks: This allows an increasing timeout, initially requesting a fast call, then allowing a bit more time, then a bit more, and so on. However, the timeout will also be adjusted to accommodate .

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.TotalExpiration
member.summary: The total expiration, across all retries.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.RetryFilter
member.summary: A predicate to determine whether or not a particular exception should cause the operation to be retried. Usually this is simply a matter of checking the status codes.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.DelayJitter
member.summary: The delay jitter to apply for delays, defaulting to .
member.remarks: "Jitter" is used to introduce randomness into the pattern of delays. This is to avoid multiple clients performing the same delay pattern starting at the same point in time, leading to higher-than-necessary contention. The default jitter simply takes each maximum delay and returns an actual delay which is a uniformly random value between 0 and the maximum. This is good enough for most applications, but makes precise testing difficult.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.#ctor(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Expiration)
member.summary: Constructs an instance with the given backoff configuration, the default RPC filter and jitter.
member.param: The backoff policy for the time between retries. Must not be null.
The backoff policy for timeouts of retries. Must not be null.
The total expiration, across all retries. Must not be null.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.#ctor(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Expiration,System.Predicate{Grpc.Core.RpcException})
member.summary: Constructs an instance with the given configuration, and the default jitter.
member.param: The backoff policy for the time between retries. Must not be null.
The backoff policy for timeouts of retries. Must not be null.
The total expiration, across all retries. Must not be null.
A predicate to determine whether or not a particular exception should cause the operation to be retried, or null for the default filter.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.#ctor(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.BackoffSettings,Google.Api.Gax.Expiration,System.Predicate{Grpc.Core.RpcException},Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.IJitter)
member.summary: Constructs an instance with the given configuration.
member.param: The backoff policy for the time between retries. Must not be null.
The backoff policy for timeouts of retries. Must not be null.
The total expiration, across all retries. Must not be null.
A predicate to determine whether or not a particular exception should cause the operation to be retried, or null for the default filter.
The delay jitter to apply for delays, or null for the defautl (random) jitter.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.IJitter
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for applying jitter to delays between retries. See the property for more information.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.IJitter.GetDelay(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Returns the actual delay to use given a maximum available delay.
member.param: The maximum delay provided by the backoff settings
member.returns: The delay to use before retrying.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.RandomJitter
member.summary: The default jitter which returns a uniformly distributed random delay between 0 and the specified maximum.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.NoJitter
member.summary: A jitter which simply returns the specified maximum delay.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.DefaultFilter
member.summary: The default retry filter, which retries operations which fail due to a status code of "not found".

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.FilterForStatusCodes(Grpc.Core.StatusCode[])
member.summary: Creates a retry filter based on status codes.
member.param: The status codes to retry. Must not be null.
member.returns: A retry filter based on status codes.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.RetrySettings.FilterForStatusCodes(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Grpc.Core.StatusCode})
member.summary: Creates a retry filter based on status codes.
member.param: The status codes to retry. Must not be null.
member.returns: A retry filter based on status codes.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase
member.summary: Common settings for all services.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new service settings base object with a default user agent, unset call settings and unset clock.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase.#ctor(Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase)
member.summary: Constructs a new service settings base object by cloning the settings from an existing one.
member.param: The existing settings object to clone settings from. Must not be null.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase.CallSettings
member.summary: If not null, that are applied to every RPC performed by the client. If null or unset, RPC default settings will be used for all settings.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase.Clock
member.summary: If not null, the clock used to calculate RPC deadlines. If null or unset, the is used.
member.remarks: This is primarily only to be set for testing. In production code generally leave this unset to use the .

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.ServiceSettingsBase.Scheduler
member.summary: If not null, the scheduler used for delays between operations (e.g. for retry). If null or unset, the is used.
member.remarks: This is primarily only to be set for testing. In production code generally leave this unset to use the .

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.UserAgentBuilder
member.summary: Helps build user agent strings for the X-Goog-Api-Client header. Our user agent is a space-separated list of name/value pairs, where the value should be a semantic version string.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.UserAgentBuilder.HeaderName
member.summary: The name of the header to set in gRPC calls.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.UserAgentBuilder.AppendVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends the given name/version string to the list.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.UserAgentBuilder.AppendAssemblyVersion(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Appends a name/version string, taking the version from the version of the assembly containing the given type.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.UserAgentBuilder.AppendDotNetEnvironment
member.summary: Appends the .NET environment information to the list.
